cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence

Class PropagationPoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • cz.cuni.mff.kocur.influence.PropagationPoint

  • public class PropagationPoint
extends java.lang.Object
    Class that defines a point, where we spread during the wave propagation.
    Author:
    kocur

        public PropagationPoint(int x,

      • PropagationPoint

        PropagationPoint(int _x,
                 int _y,
                 PropagationPoint point)
        Creates a new PropagationPoint. Sets coordinates and distance using the other point. Distance is set as distance stored inside the point and distance between the point and _x, _y is added.
        Parameters:
        _x - X coordinate.
        _y - Y coordinate.
        point - Point with coordinates and distance, from which we create this point.

    • Method Detail

      • distance

        private double distance(PropagationPoint other)
        Measures distance from this point to the other.
        Parameters:
        other - Other point.
        Returns:
        Returns the distance between the two points.

      • getNormalizedDistance

        public double getNormalizedDistance(double maxDistance)
        Parameters:
        maxDistance - Maximum distance.
        Returns:
        Returns distance/maxDistance, that is maximally one.
